Text: How do I find a serial code ?
Generates invalid hardware key, attempted 10 installs which takes forever (because of the sound library).  Buying a copy....

1.) Install Bandstand.
2.) During installation you will be required to give a serial. Open the supplied "BANDSTAND_KEYGEN.EXE"... you should be on the Serial tab.... click Generate button to Generate a Serial.
3.) After installation, run the Bandstand Registration Tool
4.) Copy your System ID from the Registration tool.
5.) Paste System ID into the Keygen tab of the BANDSTAND_KEYGEN and click Generate.
6.) Go back to the Registration Tool under (2. Authorization) and click Paste from clipboard
My antivirus describes keygen as a trojan!
so does this work?? guess ill download and see
